CustomField.description: If external attachment then doesn't have versions on salesforce. Otherwise create link to version Id.
CustomField.formula: IF( PDLM__External_Attachment_URL__c != null, null, IF( PDLM__Content_Location__c == 'E', "contenthub/openintarget?ref_id=" + PDLM__Document_Version__c, PDLM__Content_Id__c))
CustomField.label: All Versions
